Sentencas: Proton conductors loom out of the pool of candidate Materials with great potential to boost hydrogen alternatives to fossil-based resources for energy.
Titulo: Structure and Dynamics Investigations of Sr/Ca-Doped LaPO4 Proton Conductors

Sentencas: Acceptor-doped lanthanum orthophosphates are considered for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) for their potential stability and conductivity at high temperature.
Titulo: Structure and Dynamics Investigations of Sr/Ca-Doped LaPO4 Proton Conductors

Sentencas: By exploring the crystal and defect structure of x% Sr/ca-doped LaPO4 with different nominal Sr/Ca concentrations (x = 0-10) with, neutron powder diffraction (NPD) and X-ray powder diffraction (XRD), we confirm that Sr/Ca-doped LaPO4 can exist as self-supported structures at high temperatures during solid oxide fuel cell operation.
Titulo: Structure and Dynamics Investigations of Sr/Ca-Doped LaPO4 Proton Conductors
Structure and Dynamics Investigations of Sr/Ca-Doped LaPO4 Proton Conductors

Sentencas: surface topography, and size distribution are also studied to better understand the proton conductivity for dry and wet compounds obtained at sintering temperatures ranging from 1200 to 1400 degrees C using a combination of scanning electron microscopy (SEM), atomic force microscopy (AFM), Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR), and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Structure and Dynamics Investigations of Sr/Ca-Doped LaPO4 Proton Conductors

Sentencas: The results confirm that Sr-doped samples exhibit the highest proton conductivity of our samples and illustrate the impact of material design and versatile characterization schemes on the development of proton conductors with superior functionality.
Titulo: Structure and Dynamics Investigations of Sr/Ca-Doped LaPO4 Proton Conductors
